raw_body:
ARIYARATNAM – MARY ANGELA. Beloved wife of the late A. Ariyaratnam,​ loving mother of Anita,​ Ashok,​ Ajantha and Ajith,​ mother-in-law of Shankar,​ Precilla,​ Ehi and Shanika,​ grandmother of Shenila,​ Talia,​ Bovo,​ Deon and Kennen,​ expired. Cortege leaves residence (225,​ Rajapilla Mawatha,​ Kandy) at 2.00 p.m. on Friday 19th April 2024 for burial at Mahaiyawa Cemetery R.C. Section. For information: 0778 226388.
025713
